alert.note: Alert for Lehigh; Upper Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 3:50AM EST until February 28 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Hunterdon and Somerset. In Pennsylvania, Lehigh and Upper Bucks. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact this evenings commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates could reach up to one inch per hour at times tonight. The snow will mix with or even change to sleet and rain at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
